title: Get Stock Statuses
description: Get the stock status for an array of SKUs or products.

locationIds.description: The IDs of the locations for which the stock status is to be retrieved.

excludeStatus.description: Select the products stock status that you wish to exclude from the returned results - for example excludeStatus=OUT_OF_STOCK.

actualStockStatus.description: When this parameter is true, the actual stock status of the product / sku will be returned to the client. By default, we show all products / skus as in stock when the stock level is 0.

products.description: The ID of the product whose stock status is to be retrieved.
